Welcome to next generation Kerboodle –

Lessons, Resources, Assessment, and Kerboodle Books

Changes to Kerboodle

We are working hard to make Kerboodle even better, moving courses (originally published by Nelson Thornes) on to our next generation platform. Find out more about the changes.

Trouble logging in?

Please note that logins for Nelson Thornes Kerboodle were not transferred across.
Teachers - look out for your activation email and follow these steps to get started.

Latest information

5th of September

Getting started

Remember to appoint an administrator to create your student and teacher user accounts. Download the Administrator Guide for more information. Our Getting Started Guide is also available to help you get up and running.

You can also visit our dedicated support site or call 01536 452960 for technical support.

21st of August

Get ready for next generation

The (Nelson Thornes) Kerboodle site is now closed. If you have any of the following courses and you have not already done so, please contact us about your subscription to ensure you can start using next generation Kerboodle from 1st September. Call Customer Services on 01536 452960 or email support@kerboodle.com.
